懪字的基本解释

懪
bó
烦闷。
违反，违背。相反，糊涂。

懪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bó］
［《廣韻》蒲角切，入覺，並。］
(1)烦燥郁闷。
(2)悖逆。

懪字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懪； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页407第18
【廣韻】蒲角切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】弼角切，?音雹。本作?。【爾雅·釋訓】??，悶也。或从暴。　又【集韻】北角切，音剝。義同。

懪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
懪字的起名意思

暂无。

懪
Basic explanation of words
懪
bó
Bored.
Violate, violate. On the contrary, confused.
懪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bó］
["Guangyun" Pujiao cuts, enters the senses, and merges. ]
(1) Irritability and depression.
(2) Rebellion.
懪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懪; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 407 18
[Guang Yun] Pu Jiao cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] But the corner cut, sound hail. This work?. [Erya Shixun]??, bored. Or from violence.　[Jiyun] North corner cut, sound stripped. The same meaning.

bó
